# PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionType.purchase

**Case**

A purchase transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
case purchase
```

## Discussion

Use this type to receive money from the person’s card.

## Getting the transaction type

- **PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionType.refund**: A refund transaction.
